QuestData.Title: The Highlord Calls
QuestData.Description:
Highlord Fordragon has requested your presence in Oribos.
We know only that it involves the Maw.
Go to him, and show him that the Maldraxxi will never falter. Even in the face of that dark place.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Oribos.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Highlord Bolvar Fordragon in Oribos.
